Plot: Two strangers stuck in Manhattan for the night grow into each other's most trusted confidants when an evening of unexpected adventure forces them to confront their fears and take control of their lives.
Title: Before We Go
Actors: Chris Evans, Alice Eve, Emma Fitzpatrick, John Cullum
Writer: Ronald Bass (screenplay), Jen Smolka (screenplay), Chris Shafer (screenplay), Paul Vicknair (screenplay), Ronald Bass (story), Jen Smolka (story)
